title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 31.1 - Authority
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 31.1 - Authority

State Regulations

This Part is promulgated pursuant to the authority of article
12, section
191
of the

Navigation Law, which provides the commissioner with authority to adopt, amend, repeal and enforce such rules and regulations as he deems necessary to
accomplish the purposes of article 12 of the Navigation Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
31.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
